author: Epic Games
description:
Bruce Lee enters HITMAN World of Assassination as the next Celebrity Elusive target, but this time with a twist. 
Alongside 47, Agent Lee takes his legendary martial arts skills undercover to infiltrate the Concord Union and take them down from the inside. 
Neutralize any threats and complete your mission with precision and subtlety, Agents. 
Play the mission for FREE until November 20 on the Epic Games Store. https://epic.gm/Hitman3
title: HITMAN World of Assassination | New Elusive Target ft. Bruce Lee | Launch Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
Major Update Breakpoint is out now – To celebrate the release of Breakpoint, FBC: Firebreak is 40% off on Epic Games Store! Go grab it now! https://epic.gm/fbc
 
The Hiss threat keeps on growing, and now the Mold is spreading through the Research Sector. The Oldest House is reaching a breakpoint, but Firebreak, ever adaptable, is ready to face this crisis.  
The first free Major Update, Breakpoint, is packed with systemic overhauls, new content, and quality-of-life improvements - all aimed at making FBC: Firebreak more fun, varied, and rewarding to play.  
 
FBC: Firebreak is a 3-player cooperative first-person shooter set within the enigmatic Federal Bureau of Control (FBC). As the Bureau’s headquarters faces a deadly and prolonged siege by otherworldly forces, only Firebreak—its most adaptable response unit—has the skills and courage to restore order. 
 
Developed and published by Remedy Entertainment.
title: FBC: Firebreak | Breakpoint
